    • Uses of IGuiElement in de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui

      Subinterfaces of IGuiElement in de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IGuiArc
      Sub type of IArc for arcs in a IGuiModel.
      interface  IGuiNode
      Sub type of INode for nodes in a IGuiModel.
      interface  IGuiPlace
      Sub type of IGuiNode for places in a IGuiModel (places with a "token" circle).
      interface  IGuiTransition
      Interface for transitions in a IGuiModel.
      Classes in de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui that implement IGuiElement 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GuiArc
      Implements the arcs (arrows) of the Petri net.
      class  GuiElement
      Superclass GuiElement implements the common members for all nodes.
      class  GuiNode
      Superclass GuiNode implements the common members for all nodes.
      class  GuiPlace
      Implements the places for the GUI model of the Petri net.
      class  GuiTransition
      Implements the transitions for the GUI model of the Petri net.
